channel.title: Chatbox Raped
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2rxec1d.png[/img] The text is rendering up there when I type it.
That's the only issue atm. I need to get the text in the right place. [b]ALSO[/b] I need to fix Chat filters. (Don't worry about that thing in the corner, just gotta change the image when I got time)
